content: Somehow everything was different, like a new person had emerged from me; I could see myself in a perspective that I've never seen before: no ambitions, no worries. For the first time I felt like I knew where I belonged and nothing could stop me from being there. Nothing and yet everything felt real. The world was underneath me, around me, above me; I could see everything and everything could see me. I found... Peace.
author: Warptech and Soulfy
